thread.title: BREAKING: Gunmen Attack Nightclub in Istanbul; Multiple Injuries Reported
thread.title_full: BREAKING: Gunmen Attack Nightclub in Istanbul; Multiple Injuries Reported | Mediaite

author: mediaite
title: BREAKING: Gunmen Attack Nightclub in Istanbul; Multiple Injuries Reported
text:
Multiple reports are stating that a nightclub in Istanbul, Turkey has come under attack by multiple armed men.
The shooting reportedly took place at the Reina nightclub in Istanbul’s Ortaköy district at approximately 2 a.m. local time. CNN Turk has reported that two gunmen entered the venue dress up as Santa Claus, and various news outlets are reporting multiple injuries and casualties.
#BREAKING Attackers allegedly entered Istanbul's Reina night club in Santa costumes, opened fire randomly #Turkey pic.twitter.com/fApCLhdD7u
— CNN Türk ENG (@CNNTURK_ENG) December 31, 2016
breaking An armed attack on a local club, Reina, in #Istanbul . Many casualties reported. At least 2 dead and over 50 ambulances on scene pic.twitter.com/GF1vhcCoW7
— Jewish Breaking News (@JBN) December 31, 2016
#BREAKING :Terorist attack at #Istanbul 's Reina nightclub pic.twitter.com/W8RBTiF31h
— The Ankara Times (@TheAnkaraTimes) December 31, 2016
Turkish state media: Several people wounded in an armed attack involving two gunman at a nightclub in Istanbul pic.twitter.com/nLze7Zb4wI
— Sky News (@SkyNews) December 31, 2016
#Reina 'da silahlı saldırı…
Saldırganın gece kulübünde saklandığı iddia ediliyor pic.twitter.com/x5qp6b8G9j
— Habertürk TV (@HaberturkTV) December 31, 2016
This is a breaking news story, and we will update accordingly:
